metadata.synopsis: Minsc and Jaheira are bickering in the camp ahead of their reunion scene - Intended as a holding pattern to draw the player's attention to them before a big happy reunion and lore moment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Rescue Minsc from the Cistern- Go to camp- See them arguing

2.speaker: Minsc
2.text: Jaheira, Minsc has been thinking, and Boo agrees - you are owed an apology.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Clearly having not learned his lesson

9.speaker: Jaheira
9.text: Oh...? I will admit, that is unexpected. Your capture by the cult has taught you something, then.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Clearly having not learned his lesson

3.speaker: Minsc
3.text: Yes. Minsc should have charged in all the sooner - and brought a second sword, so that he might have cut all his captors down in one blow!

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Cover the hamster's ears. I'm going to scream.

8.speaker: Jaheira
8.text: The problem, ranger, is that you charged in at all. We didn't even know what we were dealing with!
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Indignant. Sure it's a doppelganger and morphed into her exact copy, but she's miffed to have been imitated. And worse, the imitation believed.

10.speaker: Jaheira
10.text: We have discussed matters like this before. You recall what the better part of valour is...?
10.context: InternalNodeContext: Handy chance to handwave why Boo ended up separated - He actually would have helped Minsc see through it.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: Of course! Eh... it is the name of one of those thick histories you have given Minsc to read, yes?
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Handy chance to handwave why Boo ended up separated - He actually would have helped Minsc see through it.

11.speaker: Minsc
11.text: Now! Where is it you lay your head, so Minsc and Boo may find a spot nearby?
11.context: InternalNodeContext: Nothing much here, just a silly throwaway

4.speaker: Jaheira
4.text: Why don't you sidle up to the fire. Sit in it, for all I care - though leave Boo aside first.

7.speaker: Minsc
7.text: Wait. Wait. Jaheira, wait. Boo suggests... that you are unhappy about something...?

12.speaker: Minsc
12.text: You have found fine companionship while we were apart. It is no common soul with the strength of arms to best Minsc in combat.

6.speaker: Minsc
6.text: Or the strength of heart, to take his hand in friendship afterwards! Though I think this perhaps had something to do with you, yes?

5.speaker: Jaheira
5.text: Yes. And I begin to wonder if I was not over-hasty.
